item.title: PD056 – Klappe, die Dritte, Action!
item.description:
Android Developer Group Berlin Slack
https://adg-berlin.herokuapp.com/
http://eshop.macsales.com/shop/ssd/owc/macbook-pro-retina-display/2013 Android N preview
http://android-developers.blogspot.de/2016/03/first-preview-of-android-n-developer.html Java8 http://developer.android.com/preview/j8-jack.html 150 Geld sparen https://pixel.google.com/developer-discount/
Learning RxJava (for Android) by example https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3D0cWyNno4 Peak Google:

Bose SoundLink Mini II als alternative Moshi
https://github.com/square/moshi https://github.com/square/moshi#built-on-okio

item.description:
• http://www.jsonschema2pojo.org/

    • https://www.codenameone.com/blog/analysis-google-moving-to-openjdk-what-that-really-means.html

  • Ubiquity
    • https://ubiquity.withgoogle.com/

    • https://media.ccc.de/search/?q=32c2

    • https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jianjia.firewall
  • NSA UA
    • https://www.bundestag.de/bundestag/ausschuesse18/ua/1untersuchungsausschuss/weitere_planungen/296996

    • mein OnePlus 1 rebootet sich jetzt immer oder friert total ein.
  • APK downloader
    • http://codekiem.com/2014/08/07/official-apk-downloader-v2-download-apk-files-from-google-play-store-to-pc/
    • http://apps.evozi.com/apk-downloader/

    • https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.homami.cars
    • Falko heißt volker
    • Dirk heißt dann biafra
  • fut.io
    • https://www.followupthen.com/

item.title: PD053 – fastboot OEM brick
item.description:

  • Kotlin 1.0 Beta

  • DevFest 2015
    • https://developers.google.com/events/devfest/

item.title: PD052 – coundlab
item.description:
Pandroid 52 07.10.2015 @cbase

  • http://getfinn.com/de/
    • criticalmaps https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.stephanlindauer.criticalmaps
    • https://github.com/criticalmaps/criticalmaps-android
  • bitlock https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/126495570/bitlock-turning-your-smart-phone-into-your-bike-ke?lang=en
  • Debug.waitForDebugger();
  • get all android devices
    • https://support.google.com/googleplay/android-developer/answer/6154891?hl=en
  • unmock https://github.com/bjoernQ/unmock-plugin
    • https://github.com/ligi/gobandroid/blob/master/android/build.gradle
  • transifex https://www.transifex.com/
  • Spock testing DSL http://spockframework.github.io/spock/docs/1.0/index.html
    • http://robospock.org/
  • XCodeGhost FAQ
    • http://www.macrumors.com/2015/09/20/xcodeghost-chinese-malware-faq/
  • http://semver.org/
  • jitpack https://jitpack.io/
  • safe mode http://www.greenbot.com/article/2923927/how-to-restart-your-android-phone-into-safe-mode.html
  • https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLnVy79PaFHMUqqvwbjyKJZv1N8rzHOCBi
  • SDK23 and play-services+proguard
    • https://code.google.com/p/android-developer-preview/issues/detail?id=3001
  • SnackEngage
    • https://github.com/ligi/SnackEngage https://github.com/PomepuyN/discreet-app-rate
  • neue Gear VR http://www.spiegel.de/netzwelt/gadgets/europa-park-in-rust-achterbahnfahren-mit-vr-brille-a-1054039.html
  • joda-time -> ThreeTenABP
    • https://github.com/JakeWharton/ThreeTenABP
    • http://blog.joda.org/2009/11/why-jsr-310-isn-joda-time_4941.html
  • vysor funktioniert gut

item.title: PD051 – 1 + 2
item.description:
Mit Falko und Dirk
  • #peakAndroid https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=80399
  • Neo900 http://neo900.org/ http://neo900.org/stuff/cccamp15/ccc2015talk/neo900-wpwrak_CCC2015.webm
  • https://www.canyon.com/eurobike2015/technologie.html
  • SBH 70 von Sony hat Dirk
  • Falko hat wieder eine Sony SWR50 (Smartwatch 2)
  • Habt ihr Empfehlungen für Bluetooth Kopfhörer die laut sind?
  • OnePlusTwo
    • Cyanogenmod http://forum.xda-developers.com/oneplus-2/orig-development/rom-unofficial-cyanogenmod-12-1-t3185511
      • No fingerprint sensor unter CyanogenOS
  • M == Marshmallow https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eVKuAmEVrhc https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DEBh1lBxg0Y
  • Null object pattern https://sourcemaking.com/design_patterns/null_object
  • JRebel Early Access https://zeroturnaround.com/software/jrebel-for-android/
  • Vysor http://www.vysor.io/  https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/vysor-beta/gidgenkbbabolejbgbpnhbimgjbffefm
  • Some apps use native code (NDK) to check for root https://github.com/devadvance/rootcloak/issues/11
  • New Android support testing lib https://plus.google.com/+AndroidDevelopers/posts/SXVtgnoKcAY
  • Lollipop Lockscreen bypass http://sites.utexas.edu/iso/2015/09/15/android-5-lockscreen-bypass/
  • Android signature verification vulnerability and exploitation http://blog.trustlook.com/2015/09/09/android-signature-verification-vulnerability-and-exploitation/
  • Kotlin M13 is out! http://blog.jetbrains.com/kotlin/2015/09/kotlin-m13-is-out/
  • android-app://foo.bar.baz https://developers.google.com/app-indexing/android/test
  • Android Dev Summit https://plus.google.com/u/0/+AndroidDevelopers/posts/dc8nMz7gpRQ
  • https://github.com/Pixplicity/humpty-dumpty-android
  • http://www.idescout.com/#contact-us-section
  • https://github.com/infinum/android_dbinspector
  • https://github.com/pilgr/Paper

item.title: PD049 – I/O 2015
item.description:
Wieder einmal mit Dirk & Falko: Link:
  • https://github.com/mortenjust/androidtool-mac
  • https://corner.squareup.com/2015/05/leak-canary.html
  • Bluetooth Advertising Bacon
    • https://jira.cyanogenmod.org/browse/BACON-3435
    • auf nach reddit damit
  • Multidex
    • https://github.com/sensorberg-dev/android-sdk/commit/5d9b13b0d297f52c6295609281c93425b76f9d55
    • https://github.com/sensorberg-dev/android-sdk/blob/master/android-sdk/build.gradle
    • https://developer.android.com/tools/building/multidex.html
    • https://android.googlesource.com/platform/frameworks/multidex/+/master/library/src/android/support/multidex/MultiDexApplication.java
  • JRebel
    • http://zeroturnaround.com/software/jrebel-for-android/
  • Apple Watch
    • Wear for iOS http://gizmodo.com/everything-google-stayed-curiously-quiet-about-at-i-o-t-1707788932
    • http://www.theverge.com/2015/4/9/8375931/android-wear-iphone-google-apple-compatible
  • Wear source code:
    • http://www.androidcentral.com/android-wear-source-code-uploaded-aosp
  • Google I/O
    • Atmo
    • Keynote
      • Falko fragt was er in der Live coverage nachvoll zieht: http://live.theverge.com/google-io-liveblog-2015-android-photos-sundar-pichai/?_ga=1.224657945.2023408518.1423223027
      • Android VR
        • http://gizmodo.com/google-s-using-an-insane-gopro-rig-and-youtube-to-bring-1707500976
        • http://gizmodo.com/googles-new-cardboard-hands-on-a-little-bigger-a-litt-1707522625
        • Jump camera https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/jump/
      • Moonshot
        • https://youtu.be/F5jj6gBKGK8?t=1m51s
      • Udacity
      • Android Car
      • Android TV
      • Android Wear
        • https://io2015codelabs.appspot.com/codelabs/always-on#1
      • Android Pay
      • Chrome custom Tabs
      • Android Doze spart Strom
      • Google Now scans apps
      • Google Photos
      • Jack and Jill compiler https://www.guardsquare.com/blog/the_upcoming_jack_and_jill_compilers_in_android
  • codelabs
    • What’s new in Android?
      • Android M permission
        • https://newcircle.com/s/post/1737/2015/05/31/the-new-android-m-permissions-model
        • Data Binding
          • https://developer.android.com/tools/data-binding/guide.html
          • https://github.com/biafra23/android-databinding
    • What’s new in Android Tools?
    • Tag 2
    • Partys
  • GDG Summit
  • Droidcon
    • Falko Donnerstag 12:20

item.title: PD047 – Weg von Google
item.description:
• Android File Transfer
    • http://www.volkersfreunde.de/android-file-tranfer-deamon-stoppen-und-loeschen/
  • Placeholder im Manifest
    • http://www.volkersfreunde.de/android-debug-buildtype-custon-label/
  • Jar tasks
    • http://www.volkersfreunde.de/android-jar-tasks/
  • adb over wifi and RSA http://nelenkov.blogspot.de/2013/02/secure-usb-debugging-in-android-422.html
  • Google Code ist tot
    • https://code.google.com/export-to-github/
    • was passiert mit https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/list
    • Note to self: tell people the repos have moved
  • OnePlus One CM12 nightly
  • “We’re attempting to take Android away from Google” http://www.fastcompany.com/3043359/app-economy/cyanogens-surprisingly-sensible-plan-to-steal-android-away-from-google
  • Testing support: http://tools.android.com/tech-docs/unit-testing-support
    • funktioniert, alles schick. Transition sollte smooth sein.
  • Android Studio 1.2 based on IntelliJ 14.1
  • Fernflower Decompiler
  • Update zum gradle deployment to Google Play: Es funktioniert wieder, alles schick #weAreLivingTheFuture
    • https://github.com/Triple-T/gradle-play-publisher
  • https://jitpack.io/
  • “Private” Maven/Gradle repository
    • http://mymavenrepo.com
  • http://fragmentedpodcast.com/
  • Pocket casts new features
    • http://www.shiftyjelly.com/pocketcasts
  • Droidcon Berlin 2015
    • http://droidcon.de/berlin/15/speaker
  • Wo reportet man Bugs im Android bei Samsung Geräten? Hat Google nicht eine compatibility Verantwortung?
    • https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=158335
    • https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=160503
  • Kotlin?
    • http://kotlinlang.org/
    • Was sagt Jake dazuhttps://updatemycode.com/2014/11/29/yosemite-as-an-ibeacon-swift/ https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ReS3ep-hjxWA8kZi0YqDbEhCqTt29hG8P44aA9W0DM8/edit?hl=en&forcehl=1
    • Kotlin on Android: http://kotlinlang.org/docs/tutorials/kotlin-android.html
    • Trying to convert a project: https://github.com/falkorichter/android-simple-bike-computer/tree/feature/kotlin
      • bytewise and and shifting only with Int
      • nice initializer: var value : Array = Array( size = valueBytes.size(), init = {i -> valueBytes.get(i).toInt()})
      • closures :)
      • convert and move :)
      • no casting, you need to know what is really going on
  • Leaving Google
    • OwnCloud
    • Wallabag
    • Tiny Tiny RSS
    • OpenVPN
    • SSL-Pflicht
      • SnakeOil -> self signed
        • nicht so gut “akzeptieren Sie alle”
      • CaCert
        • “Sie sind unsicher”
      • StartSSL
        • Gratis & funktioniert, wenn man es richtig macht
    • SSL-Kür
      • https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/
  • Tomb Raider 1 für Android:
    • https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.squareenix.tombraider1classic
  • ARC
    • https://developer.chrome.com/apps/getstarted_arc
  • Nexus 5 Bluetooth advertising
    • https://code.google.com/p/android-developer-preview/issues/detail?id=1570
    • http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/how-to-kevo-to-nexus-5-running-loillipop-t3041092
    • http://altbeacon.github.io/android-beacon-library/beacon-transmitter.html

item.title: PD046 Baseband
item.description:
Heute haben wir einen Gast der sichere Telefone baut und uns ein paar dunkle Geheimnisse erzählt. Wir diskutieren über kleine und große Sicherheitsthemen. Links:
  • https://code.google.com/p/dex2jar/
  • JD-GUI http://jd.benow.ca/
  • http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/permission-element.html
  • http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/uses-permission-element.html
  • http://repo.xposed.info/module/de.robv.android.xposed.installer
  • http://repo.xposed.info/module/biz.bokhorst.xprivacy
  • asec container
  • http://www.cnet.com/news/why-android-wont-be-getting-app-ops-anytime-soon/
Wir beenden mit der Frage, welches Telefon ein halbwegs brauchbares Baseband hat, in der Hoffung dass wir es nicht schon gekauft haben.
item.itunes:subtitle: Kleine und große Sicherheitsthemen.
item.itunes:summary:
Heute haben wir einen Gast der sichere Telefone baut und uns ein paar dunkle Geheimnisse erzählt. Wir diskutieren über kleine und große Sicherheitsthemen.
Links:
https://code.google.com/p/dex2jar/ JD-GUI http://jd.benow.ca/ http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/permission-element.html http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/uses-permission-element.html http://repo.xposed.info/module/de.robv.android.xposed.installer http://repo.xposed.info/module/biz.bokhorst.xprivacy asec container http://www.cnet.com/news/why-android-wont-be-getting-app-ops-anytime-soon/
Wir beenden mit der Frage, welches Telefon ein halbwegs brauchbares Baseband hat, in der Hoffung dass wir es nicht schon gekauft haben.

item.title: PD045 – Falko ist verschollen
item.description:
Mit Dirk, Falko und cketti.
  • Wenn man gucken will ob man aus den PlayStore ist
  • https://github.com/bitstadium/HockeySDK-Android/blob/develop/src/main/java/net/hockeyapp/android/UpdateManager.java
    • private static boolean installedFromMarket
  • Bouncer
    • http://blog.trendmicro.com/trendlabs-security-intelligence/a-look-at-google-bouncer/
    • http://googlemobile.blogspot.co.uk/2012/02/android-and-security.html
  • Petition
    • https://www.change.org/p/google-inc-provide-android-developers-with-one-on-one-communication-to-help-identify-and-resolve-policy-violations-prior-to-automated-and-irreversible-suspensions
  • Android@31c3 https://ccc.devsn.se/congress/2014/wiki/Session:Secure_your_Android
  • SS7: Locate. Track. Manipulate. http://media.ccc.de/browse/congress/2014/31c3_-_6249_-_en_-_saal_1_-_201412271715_-_ss7_locate_track_manipulate_-_tobias_engel.html#video
  • Snoop Snitch https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.srlabs.snoopsnitch&hl=en
  • Tampering protection: http://www.airpair.com/android/posts/adding-tampering-detection-to-your-android-app
  • Piracy protection http://torrentfreak.com/android-dev-punishes-pirates-at-the-behest-of-reddit-150203/
  • Android secret codes:
    • http://simonmarquis.github.io/Android-SecretCodes/
  • Ich habe etwas open sourced
    • https://github.com/sensorberg-dev/android-frontend-scanner
    • Become a beacon S5 möglich
  • Upload to Play
    • https://developers.google.com/android-publisher/api_usage
    • https://github.com/Triple-T/gradle-play-publisher
  • Neues Gradle Test Framework. Beispiel: https://github.com/ligi/AndroidNewUnitTestTest
  • Amazon automatic app testing https://developer.amazon.com/public/resources/development-tools/app-testing-service/dashboard.html
  • WebKit Vulnerabilities https://plus.google.com/+AdrianLudwig/posts/1md7ruEwBLF
  • Fabric Event in Berlin 26.2.2015 http://twitterflockberlin.splashthat.com/
  • DragonBox 5+12+
  • DragonBox Elements
  • XPosedBridge https://github.com/rovo89/XposedBridge/wiki/Development-tutorial
  • Droidcon ist divers
    • http://droidcon.de/news/its-2015-time-be-diverse
    • http://droidcon.de/call-papers
  • Richtig Http Cachen ist schwierig
    • https://github.com/square/okhttp/tree/master/mockwebserver
  • https://github.com/orfjackal/retrolambda
  • Mit Groovy Android Apps entwickeln http://www.heise.de/open/meldung/JVM-Sprache-Mit-Groovy-Android-Apps-entwickeln-2525672.html
  • DashClock Widget https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock https://code.google.com/p/dashclock/
  • OpenKeychain https://github.com/open-keychain/open-keychain
  • Nexus 9
  • Lamda unter Java 7
    • https://github.com/evant/gradle-retrolambda/issues/80
